**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 30 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 [Melianse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2230) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 71 **Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +4 **Wild Empathy** Melianse can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168) or [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207) [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) and make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of them.
 --- **AC** 21 **Fort** +11 **Ref** +13 **Will** +11 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) **HP** 78 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5 --- **Speed** 20 feet, swim 30 feet **Melee** claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+5 slashing **Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 22, attack +14 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) - **1st** [Goblin Pox](/Spells.aspx?ID=139), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (4 slots) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) (4 slots) - **3rd** [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) (4 slots) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 22, attack +14 - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (×3), [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154) - **2nd** [Water Breathing](/Spells.aspx?ID=370) **Rituals** DC 1 - **2nd** [Inveigle](/Rituals.aspx?ID=14) **Grant Desire** ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Melianse can duplicate any 3rd-level spell or produce any effect with a power level in line with a 3rd-level spell, but only in response to the request or desire of a non-[fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) creature. The creature whose desire is granted can never again benefit from Melianse's Grant Desire ability
